body_html:
And further, I needed to do this, to avoid the error in this post, related to SWIG.

bazelbuild/bazel#4053 (comment)

--- tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl.orig	2017-11-01 21:21:13.000000000 +0100
+++ tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl	2017-11-09 11:49:41.536361562 +0100
@@ -920,6 +920,7 @@
   args += [src.path]
   outputs = [ctx.outputs.cc_out, ctx.outputs.py_out]
   ctx.action(
+      use_default_shell_env = True,
       executable=ctx.executable._swig,
       arguments=args,
       inputs=list(inputs),

body:
And further, I needed to do this, to avoid the error in this post, related to SWIG.

https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/4053#issuecomment-343134886

```
--- tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl.orig	2017-11-01 21:21:13.000000000 +0100
+++ tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl	2017-11-09 11:49:41.536361562 +0100
@@ -920,6 +920,7 @@
   args += [src.path]
   outputs = [ctx.outputs.cc_out, ctx.outputs.py_out]
   ctx.action(
+      use_default_shell_env = True,
       executable=ctx.executable._swig,
       arguments=args,
       inputs=list(inputs),
```
